rulesStrings.li: bookDescNonFiction->Drawing on [authorFullname]'s years of practical experience, this [bookTypeNonFic] establishes the author as a leading authority in [subject] throughout the Mousekin Kingdom.
bookQualityNonFicBad->Almost all of the pages are on the verge of splitting from the spine.
bookQualityNonFicBad->Maggots have infested the leather covers and spine.
bookQualityNonFicBad->Nearly every page has been discolored by smoke from a fire, rendering the contents barely legible.
bookQualityNonFicBad->Opening the cover unleashes a rancid odor of urine, suggesting the previous owner had been using this copy to prop up a chamberpot.
bookQualityNonFicBad->Several pages have stains from a mug of Chonko nut brew.
bookQualityNonFicBad->The contents and introductory pages have been completely obscured by spilled black ink that has thoroughly soaked through several layers of paper.
bookQualityNonFicBad->The front and back flyleaves are almost entirely covered by the previous owner's amateurish attempts at practicing their signature.
bookQualityNonFicBad->The pages from one entire chapter have been torn out, leaving ragged stumps of paper.
bookQualityNonFicBad->The previous owner of this copy has underlined every other word on every single page with different colored inks.
bookQualityNonFicBad->The top-left corner of several dozen pages contain crude sequential doodles, depicting a Mousekin farmer repeatedly bludgeoning a Grimalkin rapid-musketeer with a gardening hoe.
bookQualityNonFicNormal->A few pages of this copy have been dogeared.
bookQualityNonFicNormal->A pressed flower has been left inside the middle pages.
bookQualityNonFicNormal->The gold inlay on the cover has dulled with age, but the book is otherwise in good condition.

bookQualityNonFicNormal->The spine on this copy has been broken in several places, and the edges on several chapters are slightly worn, suggesting the previous owner found this book particularly useful.
bookQualityNonFicGood->The book bears the imprint of a respected printing house in the capital city of Arcadia.
bookQualityNonFicGood->All the illuminations from the book have been richly illustrated with colored ink, and in some cases, adorned with gold leaf.
bookQualityNonFicGood->The cover, spine and pages are practically pristine, almost as if the previous owner treated it with great reverence - or simply never read its contents.
bookQualityNonFicGood->The cover bears intricate craftsmanship, in the form of fine details in the gold inlay illustrating the book's subject matter.
